channel.title: AWS on Notebook
channel.description: Recent content in AWS on Notebook

item.description: Learn architecture # Exercises in simple application architecture design. Tutorial: AWS Prescriptive Guidance Static website # Browser <--> Route53 <-- CloudFront <-- S3 Web application with relational database # Browser <--> Load Balancer <--> (VPC + ECS + ECR) <--> RDS Data processing # Data stream --> App? --> Kinesis Firehose (save 5min/5MB chunks of data) --> S3 (put notification: location and name of the file) --> Lambda function (get file content and parse) (send data structure to be indexed) --> ElasticSearch <--> Kibana (display dashboards from ElasticSerach) Serverless data source monitoring # Problems:
AWS command line interface # GitHub project
